attributes.description: Please complete the online enquiry form and a salesperson for McCarthy Volkswagen Constantia will be in contact with you in due course. Alternatively visit our dealership, test drives can be arranged. Please enquire regarding additional service plans and warranties. Finance can be arranged. Test drives welcome. Trade- inns accepted. Valid SA driver’s license required. Confirm the final pricing regarding this vehicle and VAT related matters, on the road costs and license and registration. T’s and C’s apply. Benefit of Mastercars is 80-point technical inspection - Balance of Volkswagen Automation plan - 2-year/ unlimited kilometre warranty- Full-service history - Vehicle history integrity check - Mileage certified - Professional vehicle reconditioning - 7-day exchange - 24 hour roadside assistance - vehicle Customization.
